citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45am on April
20, 2023. The inspector spoke to a facility representative on the phone, but the individual was unable to contact a
representative with access to the animals and records.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45am on April 
20, 2023.  The inspector spoke to a facility representative on the phone, but the individual was unable to contact a 
representative with access to the animals and records. 
 
 
 
End Section
